ComicInfo.Summary:
Acclaimed writer Matt Kindt and superstar artist Clayton Crain bring “THE ORPHAN” to a brutal boiling point!
Now that Rai’s allies back on have reunited, they must figure out a plan to retrieve their friend and topple Father’s rule once and for all. Meanwhile, Rai has his work cut out for him on Earth as his past sins come back to haunt him. Luckily for our hero, justice is Eternal…
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Interlocking Cover A | Clayton Crain | 1 | B | Interlocking Cover B | Clayton Crain | 2 | C | Cover C | Ryan Sook | 3 | D | 1:20 Retailer Incentive Cover D | Ryan Lee & Allen Passalaqua | 4 |
